short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate talent acquisition by simplifying referrals process, answer queries, and enhance engagement on LinkedIn for smarter hiring.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The browser extension is a powerful tool that enhances your recruitment efforts on LinkedIn.

Effortless Referrals: Simplify the employee referral process with one-click referrals directly from LinkedIn profiles.

Streamlined Queries: Easily query LinkedIn connections for potential candidates, saving time and expanding talent search.

Real-time Engagement: Enhance real-time collaboration between team members and HR directly within the LinkedIn platform.

Centralized Network: Keep all LinkedIn connections in one centralized hub, eliminating manual data entry and ensuring up-to-date information.

Seamless Experience: Enjoy a seamless and integrated experience, making talent acquisition on LinkedIn more efficient and effective.

Install the extension to transform your LinkedIn experience into a recruitment powerhouse, simplifying referrals, queries, and engagement for a smarter and more streamlined talent acquisition process.
